  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112252</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112252</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zivljenje nekoc-povezava s filmom</string>
            <string language="en">Life in the past</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben in der Vergangenheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie dans le passé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida no passado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita nel passato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή στο παρελθόν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida en el pasado</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ura ni bila dejansko izvedena. Potrebujemo film Srečno Kekec ali pa si sami priredite pripravo za drug film. Cilj ure je, da bi učenci spoznali, da se današnje življenje razlikuje od preteklega.</string>
            <string language="en">Find out the difference between present and past by watching movie \"Srečno Kekec\" by Jože Galet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">preteklost</string>
            <string language="en">past</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jože galet</string>
            <string language="en">jože galet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kekec</string>
            <string language="en">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">film</string>
            <string language="en">film</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie den Unterschied zwischen Geschenk und 
hinter heraus, indem Sie Film \"Sre?no Kekec \" durch Jo?e Galet 
überwachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Découvrez la différence entre le présent et 
après par observer le \"Sre?no Kekec de film \" par Jo?e Galet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre para fora a diferença entre o presente 
e após prestar atenção ao \"Sre?no Kekec do filme \" por Jo?e 
Galet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scopra la differenza fra il presente ed oltre 
guardando il \"Sre?no Kekec di film \" da Jo?e Galet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακαλύψτε τη διαφορά μεταξύ παρών και προηγούμενος 
με την προσοχή του κινηματογράφου \"Sre?no Kekec \" από 
Jo?e Galet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descubra la diferencia entre el presente y más 
allá de mirar el \"Sre?no Kekec de la película \" por Jo?e Galet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hinter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jo?e galet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">après</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">galet de jo?e</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">após</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">galet do jo?e</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">película</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oltre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">galet del jo?e</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pellicola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">από μπροστά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">galet jo?e</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταινία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">más allá de</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">galet del jo?e</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">kekec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">película</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
